alert.note: Alert for Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 3:17AM CST until March 02 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN KENDALL...NORTH CENTRAL BEXAR AND COMAL COUNTIES... At 317 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bulverde, or 15 miles northwest of Selma, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Fair Oaks Ranch, Bulverde, Guadalupe River State Park, Smithson Valley, Timberwood Park, Fischer, Spring Branch, Bergheim, Anhalt, Startzville, Sattler, Specht Store and Honey Creek State Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
